name: The Kotchei - Demo
description:
Revenge your family.

In the Kotchei you play as a undead lord risen from the dead to destroy the Order, an evil theocracy. Craft spells and powerful items, summon minions to fight alongside you, build up your keep and rob graves for more material for your research. 

The full game will have a vast slavic vale to explore, a vast array of interesting characters to interact with and many new crafting systems to work with. You will also use shapeshifting magic to infiltrate the town of Larovia. There you will exact your revenge to the clergy of the Order!

We release the demo hereto collect feedback from the players, so all views - ideas and feedback - welcome!

Fight & Command   
  • “Light RPG”-approach: the main focus is in timing ranged spells instead of skill-based combat
    • Your character can have 4 different spells prepared
    • You can trigger spells and special abilities of your minions
Craft spells & Items
  • Refine materials in the laboratory
  • Initiate rituals to create spells 
Exhume corpses
  • Dig up and dissect corpses  
  • Create new life from the dead flesh

UPCOMING FEATURES:

Shapeshift & Infiltrate
  • Shapeshift into creatures from the slavic mythology
  • Use subterfuge and stealth to get to the priesthood of the Order 
Build keep
  • Renovate the ancient home of your family
  • Defend the keep against attacks
